description: This is a React functional component file in TypeScript that implements a products page with filtering, pagination, and data fetching features for an e-commerce frontend.

methods.name: ProductsPage
methods.description: React component that renders a product listing page with filters, pagination, and loading state.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronous function to fetch products data based on current filters and update state.

methods.name: onChange
methods.description: Function to handle updating filter values.

methods.name: onApply
methods.description: Function to apply the current filters and reset to page 1.
